long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Extract Colors DevTool" is a powerful developer tool designed to simplify the process of extracting color palettes from any webpage. With just a click, this tool swiftly analyzes the colors used in the webpage's elements, providing developers with valuable insights into the design and helping them streamline their workflow. By effortlessly generating color schemes, developers can enhance their design process, ensuring coherence and aesthetic appeal throughout their projects. 

This extension comprises the following main modules:

Color picker
Color palette extractor (hex, rgb, css custom variables)
Clearing Cache
Cleaning page (removes ads)
Full-page screenshot
Window resizer
Make page content editable

Boost your productivity and creativity with "Extract Colors DevTool" â€“ your go-to solution for efficient color extraction in web development.
